name: Pancakes
guide: Mix flour, sugar, milk, and eggs in a bowl.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and add butter.
Pour batter into the skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip the pancake and cook until golden brown on both sides.

name: Scrambled Eggs
guide: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour the eggs into the skillet and stir slowly.
Cook until the eggs are softly set, then serve.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A healthy grilled chicken salad with fresh vegetables.
guide: Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill the chicken over medium heat until fully cooked.
Slice the grilled chicken and mix with tomato, basil, and olive oil.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: A rich and creamy tomato basil soup.
guide: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add salt and fresh basil, then blend until smooth.
